goal.ch: 讓學生學習基本物理化學實驗技術與各式儀器操作
goal.en: Let students learn the basic techniques of physical chemistry experiments and operations of various instruments.

outline.ch:
本課程將應用python、Excel等程式語言製圖，
此課程讓學生瞭解基礎的物理化學實驗方法，所包含的實驗有約十三個(一學年)涵蓋熱力學、量子化學、化學動力學、基本分子性質、光學與電子學儀等實驗，以輪作的方式進行實驗內容，熟習儀器操作與相關數據分析。
outline.en: “Let students learn the basic techniques of physical chemistry experiments. The 13 experimental subjects cover thermodynamics,quantum chemistry, chemical kinetics, basic physical properties of molecules, optics, and electronics. The students will be acquainted of the operations of various modern and the related data analysis.“

textbook.ch: 中央大學化學系『物理化學實驗講義』
textbook.en: “Physical Chemistry Experiments“ printed by Department of Chemistry, National Central University“

gradMethod.ch: “實驗報告 40％ 小考 5％ 口頭報告 10％ 期末考 15％ 實驗精神 30％“
gradMethod.en: “Experiment Reports 40％ Quiz 5％ Oral Presentation 10％ Final Exam 15％ Attendance ＆ Study Attitude 30％“
